result.reason: The user requested an option to increase the connection attempt limit beyond 20. Currently, the UI limits 'RdpReconnectionCount' to 200, but the underlying logic in 'RdpProtocol.cs' supports larger values by chunking attempts. Increasing the UI limit (e.g., to 9999) will fulfill the request.
result.approach: Increase the 'Maximum' property of 'numRdpReconnectionCount' in 'mRemoteNG/UI/Forms/OptionsPages/ConnectionsPage.Designer.cs' from 200 to a higher value (e.g., 9999). Verify that the extended reconnect logic in 'RdpProtocol.cs' correctly handles large values by processing them in batches of 20.
